title: Meet Two MacArthur 'Genius Grant' Scientists
description: We meet two scientists working on opposite sides of the world, both thinking creatively about rising sea levels and our changing oceans. Andrea Dutton, a geologist at the University of Wisconsin-Madison, and Stacy Jupiter, a marine biologist and Melanesia Director with the Wildlife Conservation Society, were awarded MacArthur Fellowships this fall.

itunes:title: Meet Two MacArthur 'Genius Grant' Scientists
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: The MacArthur Foundation "genius grant" winners were announced this fall. Meet two who study oceans.
itunes:subtitle: The MacArthur Foundation "genius grant" winners were announced this fall. Meet two who study oceans.
